p: For the 65 and older age group, we estimated an AF that was significantly greater than zero in 90% of the ZIP codes for EH ≥ 35 °C. Of these, the estimated AFs ranged from 0.12 to 0.69 (results not shown). Of the ZIP codes with AFs of at least 0.30, 36% were in Wayne County, MI. For EH ≥ 35 °C for men 20–49, the AF for all ZCTAs was estimated as 0.091. Likewise, for individuals ages 55–64, the statewide AF was estimated as 0.066.
